data.description_html:
Created by the legendary Shadowking of the Talfir, Verraketh's shadow crown cloaks the top of your head in a crown of magical shadow.
For the duration of this spell, your bardic music abilities tap the Shadow Weave instead of the Weave.
You receive a +4 competence bonus on Perform checks while under the effects of this spell.
The effects of this spell do not stack with the Shadow Weave Magic feat.
data.name: Verraketh's Shadow Crown
